Sun, 30 Mar 2025 01:00:00 +0000 Nicolas Zubok and Michele Roxo lost their 4-month-old baby Iris in August 2023 as a result of ailments connected to the rare disorder Kabuki syndrome. In December last year, Roxo gave birth to their son Noah, who they are calling their "rainbow baby". Also pictured is older sister Eva. Photo / Sylvie Whinray
